subject: Re: [junit] Re: [Announce] JUnit-addons 1.4 released
msgSnippet: ... The release comes with the source code, containing tests for every method and examples. And yes, the source code is in the src.jar file. -Vladimir --
messageBody:
> I'd like to see some examples of how to use the API.
> I had a look at all the references I have found on your website but
> could not find any sample code.

The release comes with the source code, containing tests for every method and
examples.

And yes, the source code is in the src.jar file.

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir R. Bossicard
www.bossicard.com
